attributes.action: Take action against countries that allow discrimination against women in the name of religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most religions treat women as second class citizens. In countries that are religious states women are controlled and oppressed by laws that deny them the same rights as men. Further still they can be punished, sometimes with the loss of thier lives, for being victims of crimes perpetrated by men.
